info.title: Company Intelligence API
info.description: API for accessing company and employee data from multiple sources

get.description: Health check endpoint.
Get aggregate statistics.
List available data sources and their contribution.
Return cache connectivity details.
List campaigns with pagination.
Get a campaign by slug.
Return overview statistics for a campaign.
Compare companies side-by-side.
List companies within a campaign.

delete.description: Remove a company from the campaign.

get.description: Export a campaign to JSON.
Export the campaign companies to CSV.

post.description: Process (or reprocess) companies within a campaign.

get.description: Return funnel-style progression metrics for a campaign.

schema.description: Override product ID for fit metrics

get.description: Stream processing events for a given process ID via SSE.

get.summary: Get full orthogonal state for a single company

post.summary: Update a specific company state dimension

get.description:
List all companies with filtering and pagination.

When product_id is provided, companies are filtered by cached fit scores
and the response includes fit data. Fit-based sorting (fit_score, urgency_score,
combined_score) requires product_id to be specified.

parameters.name: stale_days

schema.description: Filter companies with updated_at older than this many days
schema.title: Stale Days

parameters.description: Filter companies with updated_at older than this many days

parameters.name: product_id

schema.description: Filter/sort by fit for this product
schema.title: Product Id

parameters.description: Filter/sort by fit for this product

get.description:
Get company by domain with optional includes.

Use `include_signals=true` to get aggregated signals.
Use `include_fits=true&product_id=1` to get fit scores for a product.
Use `include_employees=true` to get employee list.

parameters.name: include_signals

schema.description: Include aggregated signals for the company.
schema.title: Include Signals

parameters.description: Include aggregated signals for the company.

parameters.name: include_fits

schema.description: Include fit scores; requires product_id when true.
schema.title: Include Fits

parameters.description: Include fit scores; requires product_id when true.

parameters.name: employee_limit

schema.description: Max employees to return when include_employees=True
schema.title: Employee Limit

parameters.description: Max employees to return when include_employees=True

parameters.name: product_id

schema.description: Product ID for fit scores (required when include_fits=True)
schema.title: Product Id

parameters.description: Product ID for fit scores (required when include_fits=True)

get.summary: Get Company Fit History By Product
get.description: Return historical fit scores for a company-product pair.
Return fit history for all (or filtered) products for a company.

schema.title: Response Get Company Fit History Api V1 Companies  Domain  Fits History Get

get.description: Get fit scores for a company across all or specified products.
Get all playbooks for a company.
Get employees for a specific company with filtering.
Get posts for a specific company.
Get job postings for a specific company.
Get news articles for a specific company.

List employees with flexible filtering.

Employees are first-class resources - they are the source of all signals.

Common use cases:
- Get decision-makers at a company: `?domain=example.com&min_weight=0.6`
- Find employees with signals: `?domain=example.com&has_signals=true`
- Get C-level executives: `?seniority=c_level`

parameters.name: seniority

schema.description: Filter by seniority: c_level, vp, director, manager, lead, individual
schema.title: Seniority

parameters.description: Filter by seniority: c_level, vp, director, manager, lead, individual

parameters.name: department

schema.description: Filter by department category: it, operations, hr, finance, sales, marketing, other
schema.title: Department

parameters.description: Filter by department category: it, operations, hr, finance, sales, marketing, other

parameters.name: min_weight

schema.description: Minimum aggregation weight (0-1, higher = more senior)
schema.title: Min Weight

parameters.description: Minimum aggregation weight (0-1, higher = more senior)

parameters.name: has_signals

schema.description: Filter to employees with/without detected signals
schema.title: Has Signals

parameters.description: Filter to employees with/without detected signals

parameters.name: sort_by

schema.description: Sort by: full_name, aggregation_weight, seniority_level, updated_at
schema.title: Sort By

parameters.description: Sort by: full_name, aggregation_weight, seniority_level, updated_at

Get employee by ID with optional includes.

Use `include_signals=true` to get the employee's detected signals.

schema.description: Filter by type: interest or event

get.description: Get system-wide signal statistics.
List fit scores with flexible filtering.
Get health metrics for the fit score cache.
List all products with pagination.
Get product by ID with all weights.
Get product by name.

Get ranked list of candidate companies for a product.

Returns companies sorted by combined fit score (descending).
Scores are cached and refreshed on demand.
Get playbook by ID with all details.
List all playbooks with pagination and filtering.
Expose full lineage for a playbook, including fit and signals.

List recent traces with summary info.

Returns a list of trace summaries including:
- trace_id
- start_time
- duration_ms
- total_invocations
- agents_involved
- status (completed/running/failed)

schema.title: Response List Traces Admin V1 A2A Tracking Traces Get

get.description:
Get full trace with all invocations.

Returns the complete trace including:
- trace_id
- All invocations in the trace
- Hierarchical tree structure

schema.title: Response Get Trace Admin V1 A2A Tracking Traces  Trace Id  Get

get.description:
Get hierarchical tree view of trace.

Returns a nested tree structure where each node contains:
- invocation details
- children (sub-invocations)

schema.title: Response Get Trace Tree Admin V1 A2A Tracking Traces  Trace Id  Tree Get

get.description:
Get real-time status of all invocations in trace.

Returns aggregated status including:
- total invocations
- completed/running/failed counts
- per-invocation status summary

schema.title: Response Get Trace Status Admin V1 A2A Tracking Traces  Trace Id  Status Get

get.description:
Get timeline data for trace visualization.

Returns data suitable for rendering a timeline/Gantt chart:
- start_time of the trace
- spans with start_offset_ms, duration_ms, and depth

schema.title: Response Get Trace Timeline Admin V1 A2A Tracking Traces  Trace Id  Timeline Get

get.description:
Generate Mermaid sequence diagram for trace.

Returns a Mermaid-formatted sequence diagram showing:
- Participants (agents)
- Request/response arrows between agents
- Duration and status annotations
Get details of a single invocation.

schema.title: Response Get Invocation Admin V1 A2A Tracking Invocations  Invocation Id  Get

get.description: Get child invocations of a parent.

schema.title: Response Get Invocation Children Admin V1 A2A Tracking Invocations  Invocation Id  Children Get

get.description: List recent invocations for an agent.

schema.title: Response List Agent Invocations Admin V1 A2A Tracking Agents  Agent Name  Invocations Get

get.description:
List traces for a specific company domain.

This enables business-level correlation, allowing queries like
"show all traces for siplast.com processing".

schema.title: Response Get Domain Traces Admin V1 A2A Tracking Domains  Domain  Traces Get

get.description:
Get overall tracking statistics.

Returns aggregated statistics including:
- total_traces
- total_invocations
- agents_active
- success_rate
- average_duration_ms

schema.title: Response Get Tracking Stats Admin V1 A2A Tracking Stats Get

get.description: List configured A2A agents and their published cards.

schema.title: Response List Agents Admin V1 A2A Agents Get

get.description: Fetch the agent card for a specific agent name or URL.

schema.title: Response Get Agent Card Admin V1 A2A Agents  Agent  Get

post.description: Invoke an A2A agent skill directly from the API.

schema.title: Response Invoke Agent Skill Admin V1 A2A Invoke  Agent   Skill  Post

get.description: Return extraction traces for a company with optional filtering.
Return the full detail payload for a specific extraction trace.
Return cache statistics.

delete.description: Invalidate cache entries related to a company domain.
Clear all cache entries when explicitly confirmed.
